snippet.title: Luigi's Mansion 2D: Eternal Night - F3 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
Reuploaded for F3 2021.

Download links: https://thehappyfaceking.itch.io/luigis-mansion-2d
https://gamejolt.com/games/luigis-mansion-2d/504777
https://mfgg.net/index.php?act=resdb&param=02&c=2&id=37975

One day, out of nowhere the sun disappeared and there was an eerie full moon along with an endless night, It lasted for 2 whole days before Mario decided to figure out why, so he sets off to find the cause and stop who caused it, a week later there hasn't been a sign of Mario, so Luigi goes in search of Mario. Can Luigi Save his brother again and put an end to the never ending night?

Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9M2SF3w3SB8
